text: Can I recieve the new updates?
How do I turn off the news
How do I turn off the updates
How do I turn off the news and updates
responses: To change your notification settings, please go to the settings and open the system_notification settings. After opening the My visibility settings, You will see a button for the News and for the Updates. If the backgrounds of the buttons are blue, it suggests that you will recieve notifications for the given category. If it's grey, it suggests that will not recieve the notifications for the given category.

text: What notification settings do I have?
responses: From the system notifications, your news notifications are on/off and your update notifications are on/off. To Change this, please go to the settings and open the system_notification settings. After opening the My visibility settings, You will see a button for the News and for the Updates. If the backgrounds of the buttons are blue, it suggests that you will recieve notifications for the given category. If it's grey, it suggests that will not recieve the notifications for the given category.

text: How can I recieve notifications when someone sends me a message?
How do I ercieve notifications when someone I follow publishes a note?
How do I turn on notifications for my messages?
How do I turn on the notifications for notes?
responses: To change your interaction notifications, please open the settings and go to the Interact settings. You will see that you may select 2 different buttons. One button is to recieve a notification when someone sends you a message and the second one is to recieve a notification when someone you follow publishes a note. You can click on the buttons to turn the notifications on or off. The colour of the buttons indicate if it's on or off. If the buttons are blue, it means that you will recieve notifications, if it's gray it means you will not.

text: How do I recieve notifications when someone wants to connect with me?
How do I recieve notifications when someone accepts my request to connect?
How do I recieve notifications when someone rejects my request to connect?
How do I recieve notifications when someone follows my notes?
responses: To change your connecttion notifications, please open the settings and go to the Connect settings. You will see that you may select 3 different buttons. One button is to recieve a notification when someone wants to connect with you, the second one is a notification for when someone accepts or declines your request to connect and the last one is to get notified whenever someone follows your notes. You can click on the buttons to turn the notifications on or off. The colour of the buttons indicate if it's on or off. If the buttons are blue, it means that you will recieve notifications, if it's gray it means you will not.

train_questions: How can I make the chatbot change my privacy settings?
Can I make the chatbot change my privacy settings?
Is it possible to change my privcy settings with the chatbot?
Are you able to change the privacy settings for me?
Change the privacy settings for me please.
Can you change my privacy settings?
responses: The chatbot will modify your privacy settings trough three different questions. You need to answer them so the chatbot can change your settings to your liking!
